description: Longer-horizon requests phrased by a non-technical user.

experiments.title: Checklist + apply
experiments.prompt: I'm worried this service might not shut down cleanly. Can you make a checklist you would use to review that, then apply it to this project and tell me what you find? Keep it concise.

experiments.title: Endpoints overview
experiments.prompt: Please figure out what HTTP endpoints this service exposes and summarize them for me.

experiments.title: Dependency review
experiments.prompt: Please review the dependencies and tell me which ones might be risky or need upgrades, and why.
